fields.value:
`BLENDVPD xmm1, xmm2/m128 , <XMM0>`
`/is4 VBLENDVPD xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m128, xmm4`
`/is4 VBLENDVPD ymm1, ymm2, ymm3/m256, ymm4`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Conditionally copy each quadword data element of double-precision floating-point value from the second source operand and the first source operand depending on mask bits defined in the mask register operand. The mask bits are the most significant bit in each quadword element of the mask register.
